body.name: Unicorn Stationery Set for Girls - Unicorn Gifts for Girls Ages 6 7 8 9 10-12 Years Old - Stationary Letter Writing Kit - Unicorn Toys for 6 7 8 Year Old Girls Birthday Gift Ideas - Christmas Presents
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 49 mins
features: MAGICAL UNICORN WRITING SET - Express, Organize, Cherish for years to come! Packed with stickers, pens, stamps, and more, it's ideal for young dreamers, writers and creators. Perfect as toys for 6-7 year old girls

ALL-in-a BEAUTIFUL STORAGE CASE - Spark Imagination with the best gifts for 6 year old girls ! Unleash creativity with heart-shaped cards & matching envelopes. Send magical letters. Decorate with unicorn tape & stickers. Endless creative possibilities await!
MEGA UNICORN STATIONERY SET FOR GIRLS - Includes: 20-page writing pad, pen, pencil, heart-shaped cards, small and large envelopes, 3d stickers, stamps and inkpad, unicorn tape & eraser
A GIFT TO REMEMBER - Our unicorn toys for girls age 6-8 make the perfect present for your special ones. Full of fun, magic, art and activities.

MANY USES: The unicorn stationery set makes the perfect girl toys age 7 8 9, and is not just for letters but also ideal for party invitations, blessing messages, holiday letters, home decor, and everyday decorative letters. ADD TO CART NOW!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s absolutely adorable and I can’t wait to give it to my granddaughter for her birthday!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I think the case is really cute. I like that it comes with the basics a child would need to start writing letters and cards.I wish it had a regular pencil intead of a mechanical one, and I wish it came with replacement leads.The stickers, cards, stamps, and paper pages are very unicorn and just too adorable.It was well received by my 8 year old niece. I want her to learn to journal and write so she doesn't become addicted to screen time like some or her friends.All in all it's a good set and really does look like a lot of fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 7 year old daughter. She thoroughly the unicorn stationery set! The set came in a latch box with the blank pages and matching envelopes, cards and matching envelopes, writing utensils, stamps, stickers and a stamp pad. The box was somewhat sturdy and allowed my daughter to transport her set. She used it to write notes to her friends in school which prompted their parents to buy them as well so the girls could exchange notes back and forth. This has added countless hours of play time while also encouraging my child to write more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Unicorn Stationery Set! Perfect for gifting.
reviews.reviewText: This gift was such a success with the birthday girl. My only regret was that I couldn't keep it for myself! It was hard to part with. She (and I) loved everything contained in this lovely unicorn stationery set, right down to the sweet rainbow-heart eraser. All the supplies fit perfectly in the alloted spaces. The top section neatly lifts out to reveal a hidden section underneath which holds the stationery cards.The carrying case is cardboard yet feels like it will hold up well as long as its handled with basic care.Recommend!I write honest reviews to help others make informed purchases. Since I rely on reviews, too, I appreciate how helpful they can be. Hope my review has helped you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes with so much
reviews.reviewText: This stationary kit comes with so much! Stamps, pens, ink, stickers, unicorn paper, intricate cards & envelopes, decorative tape, and a heart-shaped eraser. Not to mention the box is adorable and well made so can be kept even after all the materials have been used. This would make a wonderful gift for any unicorn fan --especial those who are creative and love to write or draw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for any age unicorn lover
reviews.reviewText: Do people still send snail mail paper letters? I know people in my family do, so even if you're an adult and love unicorns (or know someone who meets those criteria) I'd fully recommend this set. I got it for my toddler niece and she almost cried she was so happy. She's 24 years old, so it was sort of weird and cringe, but hey...to each their own, right? It's great for kids too and has a great assortment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stationary set is advertised as a "unicorn" set for girls ages 6, 7, 8, 9, 10-12. However, this symbol of a female taking a picture of herself in an inappropriate pose with her legs spread open is all over this set. This symbol appears on the box, the ink pad, on every page of the notepad, and on every envelope. I'm glad I noticed this before giving it to my innocent unicorn-loving 6 year old girl!I'm giving this 2 stars only because it contains the advertised items and the quality seems decent enough, but this product simply isn't a gift for a child.
